short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a small copy icon next to every post to copy the direct link to the post.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For Mavenlink users. 
- It creates a small copy icon next to every post to copy the direct link to the post.
- Auto-adjusts the height of the editor.

Disclaimer: 
I want to clarify that I am not affiliated with or connected to the Kantata company. This is a small tool created independently, adding features I missed in the original Kantata/Mavenlink product.
